items.name: Fb
items.title: Backside F
items.text: Designed to detect changes in responding between first and second half of the test

items.name: Fp
items.title: Infrequency Psychopathology
items.text: Designed to detect intentional over-reporting in individuals with psychopathology

items.name: S
items.title: Superlative Self-Presentation
items.comment: Developed to identify under-reporting with the entire item pool

Hs>=75: extreme and sometimes bizarre somatic concerns
65<=Hs<=74: may develop somatic symptoms in times of stress

Hy>=75: somatic symptoms as reaction to stress
65<=Hy<=74: lacks insight concerning causes of symptoms

65<=Pa<=74: extremely sensitive to opinions of others

subScales.name: Sc5
subScales.title: Lack of Ego Mastery, Defective Inhibition
